subject: Automobile Racing
Monaco Grand Prix (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: The Canadian driver, killed in a race crash in 1982, didn’t become a legend by the numbers but for his daring and skill, as he showed at the Spanish Grand Prix in 1981.
snippet: The Canadian driver, killed in a race crash in 1982, didn’t become a legend by the numbers but for his daring and skill, as he showed at the Spanish Grand Prix in 1981.
